Package yahtzee

CSC421 Web-Based Design: Assignment #2

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    YInterface
    The YIterface class controls/displays the game UI and information.
    YLogic
    The YLogic class controls all aspects of the game itself.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    YLogic.Categories
    Assigns a category to a specific number.
    YLogic.Scores
    Assigns a score to categories that have a static score.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description

Package yahtzee Description

CSC421 Web-Based Design: Assignment #2

A Yahtzee Text-Based Game

Author: Christian Carreras
Major: CSC Masters Software Development
Creation Date: 10/05/2017
Due Date: 10/13/2017
Assignment: #2
Course Number: CSC 421
Course Name: Web-Based Software Design & Devlopment
Professor Name: Dr. Dylan Schwesinger
University: Kutztown University of Pennsylvania
Purpose: To completely implement a text-based version of the game of Yahtzee.
This project will implement a one player version of the game that plays
a complete game of Yahtzee with the official rules implemented.

Help

Categories for Yahtzee can be found in CATEGORIES.txt.
Scoresheet used for the game can be found in SCORESHEET.txt.
Commands and project design decisions can be found in README.txt.
Official rules to Yahtzee can be found here.

Previous Versions

Documentation for Version 1.0 of Yahtzee can be found here.
